name: Aero Maintenance Flight Center
about: Aero Maintenance Flight Center, located at historic Pearson Air Field in Vancouver, WA, has been a cornerstone of aviation services since 1980. We offer a comprehensive range of training from student pilot to advanced ratings, including Private Pilot, Instrument, Commercial, and Flight Instructor certifications. Our state-of-the-art fleet is maintained by experienced mechanics, and our instructors come from diverse aviation backgrounds, ensuring personalized and effective training. We have partnered with Green River College to provide dual enrollment programs, allowing students to earn college credits while pursuing their aviation goals. With a unique training environment that includes mountain flying, marine weather, and communication with KPDXâ€™s Class C airspace, Aero Maintenance Flight Center is the ideal place to achieve your dream of flight. Contact us today to embark on your aviation journey.
